mapper.sql: ID, MEMBER_ID, FILE_TYPE, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME

insert into file_rec (ID, MEMBER_ID, FILE_TYPE, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE})
